azurerm_shared_image.description: Manages a Shared Image within a Shared Image Gallery.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Shared Image. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

gallery_name.description: Specifies the name of the Shared Image Gallery in which this Shared Image should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Shared Image Gallery exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Shared Image Gallery exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

os_type.description: The type of Operating System present in this Shared Image. Possible values are `Linux` and `Windows`.

description.description: A description of this Shared Image.

eula.description: The End User Licence Agreement for the Shared Image.

privacy_statement_uri.description: The URI containing the Privacy Statement associated with this Shared Image.

release_note_uri.description: The URI containing the Release Notes associated with this Shared Image.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Shared Image.

offer.description: The Offer Name for this Shared Image.

publisher.description: The Publisher Name for this Gallery Image.

sku.description: The Name of the SKU for this Gallery Image.

id.description: The ID of the Shared Image.

create.description: Used when creating the Shared Image.

update.description: Used when updating the Shared Image.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Shared Image.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Shared Image.
